Summary: Bright light Grows in intensity and then slowly disappears
divs: Sighting DetailsI step outside in my back yard to smoke a cig, and I noticed a bright star. red purplish in color. I thought It was a satellite because it was moving like one in a straight line (east). Then as soon as I noticed it wasn't a star, it got a little brighter and then it slowly started to disappear. I saw it very dim for a few seconds then I couldn't see it anymore..After it was gone I was disappointing cause it left. Could that be a a Phenomenon of a satellite? I looked to see if there was any satellites over California at this time and the direction it was going but didn't find anything
